title: Pokemon Scarlet & Violet: Changing Your Pokemon's Tera Type

steps.title: Go to Medali.
steps.content: Go to Medali. In order to change your Pokémon's Tera Type, you must have defeated Medali's Gym Leader, Larry.

steps.title: Enter the Treasure Eatery.
steps.content: Enter the Treasure Eatery. While this is the location where you fight Medali's Gym Leader, you can also talk to the chef behind the counter to change your Pokémon's Tera Type. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Talk to the chef and hand over 50 Tera Shards.
steps.content: Talk to the chef and hand over 50 Tera Shards. To change a Pokémon's Tera Type, you need 50 Tera Shards of the desired type.

steps.title: You can get Tera Shards from Tera Raid Battles.
steps.content: You can get Tera Shards from Tera Raid Battles. You must do Tera Raid Battles that are at least 3-star difficulty or higher to get Tera Shards. [2] X Research source The Tera Shards you get will match the raid boss's Tera Type. Higher-difficulty raids usually reward you more Tera Shards. Tera Raid Battles can be found by interacting with the crystal caves that spawn around the map. [3] X Research source The color of the crystal designates what Tera Type the boss is. You can farm more Tera Shards by eating a Raid Power sandwich before raiding. Check your sandwich ingredients and recipes and try to make a Level 2 or Level 3 Raid Power sandwich to increase the amount of drops you get from a raid.

steps.title: Wild random Tera Type Pokémon will drop shards.
steps.content: Wild random Tera Type Pokémon will drop shards. If you see a glowing Pokémon in the wild, that means the Pokémon has a random Tera Type. If you defeat or catch one of these Pokémon, they can give you a few Tera Shards when you finish the battle.

steps.title: Some NPCs will give Tera Shards.
steps.content: Some NPCs will give Tera Shards. The chef at Treasure Eatery will give you 50 normal Tera Shards the first time you speak to her. You can get 50 rock Tera Shards from Tyme and 50 dragon Tera Shards from Hassel at the academy after completing their respective storylines.

steps.title: Tera Shards can be found as hidden items around the world.
steps.content: Tera Shards can be found as hidden items around the world. You can find these out in the wild and various bases.
